text:
The sync task's preserveintarget parameter doesn't work correctly.  Given the
task below, the .svn directory and its files will be preserved, but
subdirectories of .svn will be deleted.

<sync todir="somedir">
    <fileset refid="somerefid"/>
    <preserveintarget>
        <include name="**/.svn/**"/>
    </preserveintarget>
</sync>
Note, it only deletes empty directories which effectively destroys the working copy. However, those need to be preserved as well in order to not destroy the working copy.
creator: gunnar@wagenknecht.org

text:
It is not documented, but the includeemptydirs attribute applies to preserveintarget as well.

svn revision 723583 contains a testcase that shows that empty dirs are preserved if the attribute is true.

It may be a good idea to have a separate attribute to control the behavior.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text: documentation and an almost complete implementation is in svn revision 727750 - there is a bug in DirectoryScanner that needs to be fixed to make the feature complete.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
